Jimin has become the First and Only Artist in the World to have two (2) songs with 110 #1's on Tunes Worldwide 
"With You" is also the only song to achieve 110 #1's in 2022
Jimin did that with 1 unpromoted OST & 1 B-side
With You" charted in 42 countries and regions on Apple Music, setting the record as the First and Only Korean OST to chart this much in the platform
Jimin's "With You" becomes the fastest song in history to reach #1 on iTunes in 100 total countries, breaking the record held by BTS_ "Dynamite".

Jimin and sung woon becomes the fastest Korean soloist to reach #1 in iTunes in all of the 8 biggest music markets in the world!
He did it in less 4 hours 42 minutes

I am Jimin's and BTS fan and Sungwoon sang like an angel, both sang beautifully and the melody is great. Now.... what I wish was smoother is the lyrics in English. To me the words don't flow easily, they don't feel smooth and melodic. This is not because of the way singers sing them but because of the way lyrics are put together, the choice of words next to each other - they may look good on paper but feel awkward when sang and would sound awkward if sang by anyone - Jimin and Sunwoon did not have an easy job for sure. I don't know if anyone else feels the same, I wish perfection for Jimin and Sungwoon but think the lyrics have let them down a little bit on this occassion.

French trad/ Traduction en Français :   

Je veux être avec toi
Et je veux rester avec toi
Tout comme les étoiles qui brillent dans le ciel
Tu brilles de mille éclats
Assis là à tes cotés, je suis immobile
Je vais là où tu veux
Tu vivras à l'intérieur de moi jusqu'à la fin des temps
En prenant de profonds soupirs, à l'intérieur de moi


Prends tout ce que j'ai
Je ne suis rien sans ton amour
Je te promets que je ne quitterai
Mon cœur bat grâce toi
Pour toujours et jusqu'à la fin des temps
Il n'y a que toi qui peut prendre mon coeur
Mon amour adoré
Je veux rester avec toi


Les souvenirs sont toujours ici dans la pièce appelé le coeur
plein de conversations avec vous
Je ne sais même pas quand c'était
